errors.logging_in: An error occurred while logging in
errors.logging_out: An error occurred while logging out
errors.starting: An error occurred while starting the conversation
errors.google_script_error: Your browser is likely blocking Google integration. This usually happens with Safari when using content blockers. Try using a different browser or temporarily disable this feature

entrance.one: By continuing, you agree to our

section_one.title: Improve your mental health in a easy way
section_one.paragraph_one: MindSage is a platform that helps you feel better as you go through life's ups and downs.
section_one.paragraph_two: Chat with Mindy, our emotional artificial intelligence who is ready to guide you on a journey of self-knowledge and improvement of your mental health.
section_one.paragraph_three: Receive therapeutic counseling to deal with anxiety, stress, depression and anything else that is bothering you. We can help you find a specialist if you need additional help.

section_two.title: Count on us to have someone by your side
section_two.paragraph: You will receive practical advice to apply today and learn better ways to cope with the future.

one.title: Boost your confidence
one.description: Learn to replace negative self-criticism with acts of self-compassion

two.title: Discover yourself
two.description: Uncover your values, beliefs, and motivations to live a more meaningful life

three.title: Change thinking patterns
three.description: Retrain your brain with functional thoughts to avoid stress and anxiety

four.title: Understand your emotions
four.description: Stay in tune with your anxieties and desires and learn why you react the way you do

section_three.title: Small conversations, significant progress
section_three.paragraph_one: We believe we can combine science with technology to help you feel better, no matter what you're going through.
section_three.paragraph_two: Our technology combines decades of psychological research with artificial intelligence to respond with empathy and compassion to anything you want to talk about.
section_three.paragraph_three: We use clinically tested therapeutic approaches in conjunction with one of the most complete models of artificial intelligence today, OpenAI's ChatGPT.

login.title: Welcome back!
login.description: To access our tools, simply log in to your account.

register.title: Let's start your journey!
register.description: It's easy and fast. Just choose a registration method below:

setup.title: Welcome to MindSage!
setup.description: I'm Mindy and I'm here to help you feel better.
steps: Before we begin, I need to make it clear that all our conversations are encrypted and we do not store any records of them. We only store basic personal information to help me assist you better and improve my intelligence over the sessions. By continuing, you agree to this.
I will need to know some information about you to be able to help you, okay?
Please wait a moment while I process the information...

box.title: Welcome back, {{name}}
box.description: Click the button below to start a new conversation with me.
box.initialMessage: Hello, {{name}}! How are you feeling today?

name.label: Name
name.helperText: Just the first name is enough

dialog.title: Delete account
dialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
